channel.title: [PI] Kill message comes to early
channel.description: When you kill somebody in the game the kill message appears before they actually do the death emote and disappear. I want it to appear after. How would I go about doing this?

item.title: [PI] Kill message comes to early
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

In the death method in your server, find the line that send them back to certain coords(like home) or checks if they’re in a certain region and dead.
Then somewhere above the line before they get sent to that area, write c.sendMessage(“Oh dear, you have died.”); or something similar that fits your servers variables.
Make sure you write this line AFTER it checks if the player is dead.

Read full topic
